```{r}
BabyNames %>%
  group_by(name) %>%

```

```{r}
PopularCounts <- 
  BabyNames %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  filter(rank(desc(count))<=100) %>%
  summarize('TRUE'=sum(count))

PopularCounts <- 
  BabyNames %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  filter(rank(desc(count))>100) %>%
  summarize('FALSE'=sum(count))

PopularCounts
```

```{r}
PopularCounts <- 
  BabyNames %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  mutate(frac_in_top_100 = rank(desc(count))<=100) %>%
  group_by(year,frac_in_top_100) %>%
  summarize(total = sum(count)) 

PopularCounts

GlyphReady <-
  PopularCounts %>%
  spread(frac_in_top_100,total) %>%
  mutate(frac_in_top_100 = `TRUE`/(`TRUE`+`FALSE`))

GlyphReady
```
